title: Shouldn't Riot add voice chat now, cuz of dynamic queue?
body:
There's always a chance of high amount of premade vs full solo queue, but with a voice system it'd still be pretty fair.

I don't see how a voice chat at this point is bad.... Theres always a mute option, and people ping the same time they say a lane is missing usually. And people should still assume some people just don't have a mic or sound.
